title: Forget the new color, and grab this ‘natural’ Apple Watch Ultra 2 for its best price ever
content:
Macworld

There may be a cool new color for the Apple Watch Ultra 2, but otherwise, it’s the same device as last year’s model. And if you can do without black, we’re seeing the best price on the Apple Watch Ultra 2 right now, which is available for $689 at Amazon, down from $799.

The Ultra 2 is a fantastic choice for anyone who wants a rugged smartwatch with a large and bright screen and a fantastic battery life. In our review of the Apple Watch Ultra 2, we gave it a 4- out of 5-star rating, with our expert appreciating the screen, the slick operating system, and the great performance in tracking sports and workouts.

Apple Watch Ultra is like a regular Apple Watch on steroids. It has a 49mm display, a bigger crown that’s easier to use while wearing gloves, and an extra Action button that can be customized to do various things, alongside activating the built-in 86-decibel siren.

The Ultra 2 has a fantastic water resistance of up to 100m; it comes with LTE built-in and about a million features you’ll be able to use. For instance, it comes with dual-frequency GPS, loads of health and safety features like heart tracking and emergency services access, and many training metrics for those who are into running, cycling, hiking, or swimming, to name a few.

While the new Apple Watch sounds fantastic, there’s still something to be said about buying the Apple Watch Ultra 2 for its best price yet. So go ahead and snatch the Ultra 2 for $689 at Amazon while you still can.
